channel.title: Ok i thought my server was online but
channel.description: i cant register it on the serverstatus page cause its offline? umm...im confused... :confused: :confused:

item.title: Ok i thought my server was online but
item.dc:creator: @xxxxxx_13 xxxxxx 13
item.description:
@xxxxxx_13 wrote:

dude wtf are u talking about? not meaning to be rude but u dont need a hamatchi if u dont have a wireless. i have a router but i dont use it… lol its unplugged. i know plenty of ppl who dont port forward and still have no-ips but idk how! LOL

i know it really stinks.

item.source: Ok i thought my server was online but

item.title: Ok i thought my server was online but
item.dc:creator: @darkandlightjak5 darkandlightjak5
item.description:
@darkandlightjak5 wrote:

For one, but make sure that your server is running ok?
Then try to register it.
If that doesn’t work, type your Default Gateway in the address bar. Then log onto your account, and don’t ask me for the password, because I do not know yours. After you log in, scroll down, and look for something that says “games” or “Port Forward, and Triggering” like mine says. Then hit add custom. Type your server name in it as it’s name. For example it would be myserver.no-ip.info. Take out the no-ip.info. Start the port as 3333, or 43594. Then your done. Oh, and you might not have downloaded DUC from the no-ip site.

Read full topic
